reviews.review: Pretty fun game with a friend, haven't found a lot of bugs, story is good. Overall 9/10
One of the best games ever. Will there ever be a Portal 3? I sure hope so.
You should play this game it's really good and cheap as well
One of the best games I've ever played!
One of the best games for couples. I know this even though Im single lol
And the Favorite Game award goes to: Portal 2 This game is full of puzzles, Beautiful updated graphics, Content, and a whole new level builder and coop mode if only there were a Portal 3.

из дырки в дырку

A fantastic follow up to the first entry with even more of hilarious glados mocking and puzzle based gameplay
Por 0,81 Centimos ni te lo pienses, compralo
Хорошая кооперативная игра, очень весело провести время в кругу друзей :-)

“When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don't want your D*** lemons, what the h*** am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I'm the man who's gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!

Portal 2 takes all the good puzzle solving of Portal 1 and adds a great narrative story on top of it. Additionally it offers an entire original set of levels for cooperative play, which can even be done online through Steam. It offers plenty of content at a steal of a price. You'd be crazy not to own it on Steam already.
牛逼就完事了，双人单人都好玩，沉迷
It's an amazing fun game that you can play when you're bored playing other games. Takes your mind off everything and improves on puzzle solving.
Muito bom , jogo sem bugs e ótima qualidade visual .
這遊戲真的挺不錯的，不會很難，但很容易頭暈，使用傳送門的時候有一種失重的感覺。傳送門的價格絕對絕對既抵，幾乎等同白送的XD，同你既fd一起玩，用你既智商壓制佢啦！

In my opinion Portal, 2 and Portal 1 deserve a much bigger community.

Because of Portal 2, with its mechanics, ideas, humor, etc.
is a very awesome game.

Sometimes your brain might start hurting, but solving hard puzzles in a short time, makes you feel good, satisfied. 

I recommend this game to everyone.
Franchement, c'est l'un des meilleurs jeux auquel j'ai pu jouer, que ce soit pour l'histoire, les graphismes ou l'environnement et les méchaniques de gameplay
História muito boa,puzzles difíceis e plot criativo
Гав но полное, нету кейсав, но все равно рекомендую

Bardzo dobra gra, bez wielkich wymagań sprzętowych.

Výborná logická hra. Hru budu hodnotit spíše z té příběhové části. Hra je za mě velmi dobře zpracovaná, zábavná a nemůžu jí nic vytknout. Každopádně tuhle hru nemůžu hodnotit jako ostatní, protože hra se nedá úplně považovat za oficiální příběhovou hru. 

Bodové hodnocení: 10/10
和朋友一联机就卡掉  但的确超级好玩

Игра очень понравилась.
Великолепный сюжет и отличная атмосфера дают полное погружение в происходящее.
Геймплей на скучный да и игра очень хороша по практически всем аспектам.

Ich bin immer wieder überrascht, das einige Leute Portal/Portal 2 immer noch nicht kennen. Jeder der sich zumindest ein bisschen einen Gamer schimpft, sollte dieses Spiel zumindest mal versucht haben!
always an all time favorite highly recommend

Jogo simplesmente incrível, peguei por 2 pila na promoção achando q seria só um jogo de puzzle muito bom em ser um puzzle, mas é muito bom em tudo, até no gráficos q é de 2011, e principalmente a história, e olha q ainda não joguei o multiplayer, mas realmente, e o jogo custasse 50 reais eu acho q ainda valeria a pena, recomendo MUITO comprar
Awesome. Truly a masterpiece. Both singleplayer and multiplayer are extremely fun and interesting.

Very fun and challenging, good with friends

O jogo Portal 2 é um jogo muito demorado e muito bom,ele te da diversas fases no modo coop e no single player, cada fase te da uma novidade e o jogo se torna mais complicado,na minha opinião o modo coop é o mais divertido.
Amazing game now have played it several hours and it seems really great. got for 81 cents from summer sale
